name: download_file
description: Download a file from a given URL and save it to a specified path. If output_path is not provided, the file will be saved to a default working directory using the filename from the URL.

url.description: The URL of the file to download. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS link.

output_path.description: Optional full file path (including filename) to save the downloaded file. If not provided, the filename is inferred from the URL and saved in the working directory.
